chapter.title: Future plans
chapter.para: Full road map for JBossRemoting can be found at http://jira.jboss.com/jira/browse/JBREM?report=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.project:roadmap-panel .

If you have questions, comments, bugs, fixes, contributions, or flames, please post them to the JBoss Remoting users forum ( http://www.jboss.com/index.html?module=bb&op=viewforum&f=222 ). You can also find more information about JBoss Remoting on our
wiki ( http://www.jboss.org/wiki/Wiki.jsp?page=Remoting ). The wiki will usually contain the latest updates to doc and features that did not make it into the previous release.
